titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the UE District 11 Records, 1940s-1990s UE.15.11
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:13:41 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United Electrical, Radio and Machine Workers of America. District 11

did.abstract: District 11 of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America (UE) included locals in the Chicago and Milwaukee area. This subgroup contains correspondence, subject files, membership cards, and publications regarding District 11 locals, companies, and research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subgroup contains correspondence, subject files, membership cards, and publications regarding District 11 locals, companies, and research. Files include information on local contracts, organization efforts, and district council meetings. Membership cards and lists are also present, as well as copies of the Chicago UE News.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This subgroup has not yet been arranged, however approximately half of the collection has been inventoried at the box level and the collection is open for research. Please contact the Archives Service Center for more information.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Records of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America (UE) are closed for a period of twenty-five years after their creation.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America, District 11 in 1994, 1997, 2006.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: UE District 11 Records, 1940s-1990s, UE.15.11, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UE District 11 Records, 1940s-1990s, UE.15.11, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: A processing plan for this collection was written by Zachary Brodt in July 2008.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: UE National Office Records Relating to District 11 and District 11 Locals, 1936-1990s, UE.4.1.11, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
